goal: Identify frequent itemsets and association rules from grocery transaction data for insights into purchasing patterns.
persona: A data analyst working in retail analytics with 3 years of experience, specializing in customer purchase behavior analysis and market basket optimization. This analyst is focused on leveraging data-driven insights to enhance inventory management and promotional strategies by applying association rule mining techniques like the Apriori Algorithm. Interested in understanding consumer trends and improving cross-selling opportunities in grocery stores.
